languages.text: {n}Спустя несколько секунд все черепа затягивают некий гимн — монотонное гудение на одной ноте, которое очень быстро начинает сверлить вам виски. Однако черепа и не думают останавливаться.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя несколько секунд все черепа затягивают некий гимн — монотонное гудение на одной ноте, которое очень быстро начинает сверлить вам виски. Однако черепа и не думают останавливаться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数秒後、スカルたちは何かの聖歌を「歌い」始め、同じ音を延々と打ち込み続けた。そのせいで、あなたのこめかみはすぐにズキズキと痛み出した。彼らが止める気配は、まったく感じられない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数秒後、スカルたちは何かの聖歌を「歌い」始め、同じ音を延々と打ち込み続けた。そのせいで、あなたのこめかみはすぐにズキズキと痛み出した。彼らが止める気配は、まったく感じられない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einigen Sekunden beginnen die Schädel, eine Art Hymne zu "singen", und hämmern die immer gleichen Noten in deine Schläfen, sodass du rasch Kopfschmerzen bekommst. Du erkennst kein Anzeichen darauf, dass sie jemals damit aufhören werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einigen Sekunden beginnen die Schädel, eine Art Hymne zu "singen", und hämmern die immer gleichen Noten in deine Schläfen, sodass du rasch Kopfschmerzen bekommst. Du erkennst kein Anzeichen darauf, dass sie jemals damit aufhören werden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques secondes, les crânes commencent à « chanter » une seule et unique note sur un rythme répétitif qui vous vrille les tympans et vous provoque quasi instantanément un mal de tête. Ils ne semblent pas vouloir s'interrompre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques secondes, les crânes commencent à « chanter » une seule et unique note sur un rythme répétitif qui vous vrille les tympans et vous provoque quasi instantanément un mal de tête. Ils ne semblent pas vouloir s'interrompre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varios segundos después, los cráneos empiezan a «cantar» una especie de himno que te taladra los tímpanos con la misma melodía monótona hasta que tu cabeza amenaza con estallar. No intuyes un final próximo en su interpretación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios segundos después, los cráneos empiezan a «cantar» una especie de himno que te taladra los tímpanos con la misma melodía monótona hasta que tu cabeza amenaza con estallar. No intuyes un final próximo en su interpretación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几秒钟之后，伺服头骨开始“唱”起了某种赞美诗，完全相同的音符响了起来，没有任何起伏变化。它们的“合唱”钻着你的太阳穴，你感觉脑袋很快疼了起来，但伺服头骨没有任何停下来的迹象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几秒钟之后，伺服头骨开始“唱”起了某种赞美诗，完全相同的音符响了起来，没有任何起伏变化。它们的“合唱”钻着你的太阳穴，你感觉脑袋很快疼了起来，但伺服头骨没有任何停下来的迹象。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saniyenin ardından üç kafatası hep birden bir tür ilahi "söylemeye" başlıyor. Aynı nota istikrarlı bir şekilde kulaklarına çalındıkça acı çekmeye başladığını hissediyorsun. Asla durmayacaklarmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, the skulls begin "singing" some kind of hymn, drilling the same, constant note into your temples, which quickly start throbbing with pain. You see no indication that they are ever going to stop.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç saniyenin ardından üç kafatası da bir tür ilahi "söylemeye" başlıyor. Aynı nota istikrarlı bir şekilde kulaklarına çalındıkça acı çekmeye başladığını hissediyorsun. Asla durmayacaklarmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
